name: SAVE THE DODOS ! GMTK2021
description:
Hello Hello ! I'm the last Dodo on this island, and i don't like it !
I have this gut feeling that something bad will happen to us, the Dodos.

The humans came on this island, they will help us ! They always do :)

You will see, this island is special, they say it grew from a COCONUT ! XD
Who believes that ?!

Look, it's me there. I look marvelous !



Those big things send us big packages, and superb trash !


The file is on Google Drive, when you press Download make sure to allow the pop-pup which redirects you to the Drive URL
Or you can click there if you don't believe me :
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EwZf6NnQSJlSJKl9O6TZoZIrUoQx2dsS/view?usp=shari...

Game Design, Art & Prog by me
Music by BillyNat

This game was made for the GMTK Jam 2021.
